document_data.mainbody:
Fleer was a fisherwoman from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Fleer was a human woman with a bronze skin tone, light brown hair and eyes. She wore a blue commoners tunic and a workmans trousers.
In the , as the Absolute crisis ravaged the Gate, Fleers fishing was damaged further by pollution of the Gray Harbor. Fishers in the Lower City kept pulling up nets filled with fish covered in black oily goo. In reality, the fish was smothered in oil pollution left behind by a submersible used by the Cult of Bane to transport Lord Gortashs prisoners into the drowned Iron Throne headquarters prison at the bottom of Gray Harbor.
